title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours      Ranger Talks and WalksPark Rangers offer talks and guided tours on a regular basis, from 15 to 90 minutes in length. Inquire at the Visitor Center front desk for times and location. Please wear sturdy shoes, bring water, and be prepared for the season's weather.  Schools and Tour Groups Schools and tour groups may request reservations for special programs as staffing allows. Please call (760) 878-2194, ext. 3333, to schedule a field trip any time during the year. Or download and print the Ranger Program Reservation form and fax it to (760) 878-2949. Please allow 48 hours for a ranger to get back to you.  Call (760) 878-2194 ext. 3333 if there are any changes or cancellations. There is no charge for the tour or for parking. Ranger-led programs are normally ninety minutes long; this includes time to see our 22-minute film and look at the exhibits.
